00014 #ifndef TIMEDSELECTABLE_H
00015 #define TIMEDSELECTABLE_H
00016 
00017 #include "Selectable.h"
00018 #include "TimeoutClock.h"
00024 class TimedSelectable: public Selectable {
00025 public:
00026    TimedSelectable( uint32 workingTimeout = MAX_UINT32, 
00027                     uint32 idleTimeout = MAX_UINT32 );
00028    virtual ~TimedSelectable() { }
00029 
00030 
00031    inline void setTimeout( uint32 timeout );
00032    // @return minimum time left of the two clocks
00033    inline uint32 getTimeLeft() const;
00035    inline uint32 getAbsoluteTime() const;
00036 
00038    inline bool timedOut() const;
00040    inline void resetTimeout();
00041 
00042    void setWorking();
00043    void setIdle();
00045    virtual bool wantRead() const = 0;
00047    virtual bool wantWrite() const = 0;
00049    virtual void handleIO( bool readyRead, bool readyWrite ) = 0;
00051    virtual void handleTimeout() = 0;
00052 
00053 
00054 private:
00055    TimeoutClock m_timer; //< timer
00056    const uint32 m_workingTimeout; //< working timeout for selectable
00057    const uint32 m_idleTimeout; //< idle timeout for selectable
00058 };
00059 
00060 inline
00061 bool TimedSelectable::timedOut() const
00062 {
00063    return m_timer.timedOut();
00064 }
00065 
00066 inline
00067 uint32 TimedSelectable::getAbsoluteTime() const 
00068 {
00069    return m_timer.getAbsoluteTime(); 
00070 }
00071 
00072 inline
00073 uint32 TimedSelectable::getTimeLeft() const
00074 {
00075    return m_timer.getTimeLeft();
00076 }
00077 
00078 inline
00079 void
00080 TimedSelectable::resetTimeout()
00081 {
00082    m_timer.reset();
00083 }
00084 
00085 inline
00086 void TimedSelectable::setTimeout( uint32 timeout )
00087 {
00088    m_timer = TimeoutClock( timeout );
00089 }
00090 
00091 #endif // TIMEDSELECTABLE_H
